generatedPrompts.frontCover: A funny cartoon birthday cake with googly eyes and a wide, mischievous grin, wearing a tiny party hat askew on its single, wobbly candle flame. The cake is mischievously tipping over, causing a joyful explosion of vibrant, multi-colored confetti and whimsical, translucent watercolor balloons that float around it. In the center, the words "happy birthday" are written in a beautiful, flowing, and easily readable handwritten cursive script. The entire scene is a flat 2D watercolor painting, featuring soft, flowing colors, artistic brushstrokes, visible paper texture, and charming organic paint bleeds at the edges of the shapes, creating a cheerful, vibrant, and lighthearted design.

- PUT TEXT IN QUOTES: Always enclose the message text in double quotes to make it clear this is literal text to be rendered exactly
- CRYSTAL CLEAR LEGIBILITY: The handwriting must be extremely readable - prioritize clarity over artistic flourishes
- NO SPELLING ERRORS: Every word must be spelled correctly exactly as provided
- PROPER SPACING: Use appropriate letter spacing, word spacing, and line spacing for easy reading
- CONTRAST: Ensure high contrast between text and background for maximum readability
- SIZE: Make text large enough to read easily - avoid cramped or tiny text
- COMPLETE MESSAGE: Include the ENTIRE message text - do not truncate, abbreviate, or omit any part
